item.title: Raspberry Pi Guide
item.description: How to install Ubuntu in your Raspberry Pi 4 without Keyboard nor screen How to change the hostname How to change language and timezone Users How to create a new user in Ubuntu How to activate SUDO for a user Networking How to set up WIFI on Ubuntu Running on the Raspberry Pi 4 How to resolve LAN hostnames How to monitor network traffic with vnStat Customization Customize the terminal with-screenfetch Customize bash prompt with colours How to add alias to your Linux
